entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 10:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
